attributes.action: Make clear that airport security is of paramount importance to this country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The protest by the human rights lobby to make illegal the implimentation at airports of body scanning should be overuled.
The vast majority of the public would rather that all possible avenues are examined and put in place to deter/make difficult all/any would be terrorists from any attempt to disrupt the safety of our skies.
